0.19-11.Author: Deepayan Sarkar <deepayan.sarkar@r-project.org>
0.19-11.Description: Lattice is a powerful and elegant high-level data<U+000a>visualization system, with an emphasis on multivariate data,<U+000a>that is sufficient for typical graphics needs, and is also<U+000a>flexible enough to handle most nonstandard requirements.  See<U+000a>?Lattice for an introduction.
0.19-11.Title: Lattice Graphics

0.20-30.Description: Lattice is a powerful and elegant high-level data<U+000a>visualization system, with an emphasis on multivariate data, that is<U+000a>sufficient for typical graphics needs, and is also flexible enough<U+000a>to handle most nonstandard requirements.  See ?Lattice for an<U+000a>introduction.
0.20-30.Title: Lattice Graphics
